title: Where Can Wisdom Be Found?
summary: Job reflects on the mystery of true wisdom. He compares it to hidden treasure—valuable and rare. He concludes that only God knows the way to wisdom, and the fear of the Lord is its beginning.

faq.question: What is Job’s conclusion about wisdom?
faq.answer: That it can’t be found in the earth or bought—it belongs to God alone.

faq.question: How does one begin to be wise?
faq.answer: By fearing the Lord and turning from evil.
